output.sentences: While traveling to our location, everything was going smoothly.
All of the creepy sights made for a very cool experience.
This mom was soaked when her son jumped and spilled his drink.
Each of the performances were excellent.
We went out to watch the sunset together, the perfect end to the perfect day.
